name: 32 Jumps
description:
• Camera: Side-Scroller
  • Control: Mouse and Keyboard 
  • Graphics: 16-bit pixel
  • Duration: Very short... Maybe...

Credits: 

  • Character sprites: rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero
  • Music: opengameart.org/content/8-bit-cave-loop
  • SFX: groovymaster.itch.io/groovys-50-retro-sound-effects-package
  • Tileset: szadiart.itch.io/pixel-fantasy-caves

Known Bugs:

  • Holding jump while landing is a bad idea. Don't do it. 
  • Menus are a little finicky, but they work. 
  • Use a controller at your own risk (doesn't work with menus)
